dialogues.text: Oh my, is that a French Bulldog? Come here, dearie! I haven't seen one of your kind on neighborhood watch before.

choices.text: What do you know about the troubles?

dialogues.text: Those dreadful raccoons have been rummaging through everyone's bins! And I swear I saw their leader... the Raccoon King himself, lurking in the sewers.
If you're brave enough to face him, you'll need to prove yourself first. The mini-bosses guard the path... defeat them and the way will open.
That's the spirit! Here's a little something for your journey. Be careful out there, Momi!
A healthy dose of caution is wise. Train hard, get stronger, and come back when you're ready. I believe in you!
Well, don't be a stranger! Come chat with old Gertrude anytime. I've got stories about this neighborhood that would curl your ears!
Back again? You remind me of my old dog, Biscuit. Always on patrol! The raccoons have been quieter since you've been around.
I heard the pigeons up on the rooftops have been acting strange. Some sort of king among them... Be wary if you climb up there.
Such a polite pup! Take care of yourself out there, dearie.
